title: City & County of San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance
custom_expected:
This section is only inserted for users in CA who are from SF.

This is not an HTML section, but a PDF that must be separately inserted into the document.

title: Authorization & Acknowledgement
custom_expected:
Using docusign and based on the questionnaire answers, the A&A is inserted for users who live and work in all states.

The fields are

Dated

Signature

Printed Name

Copy of report checkbox

The copy of report checkbox and related text is inserted only for users who live or work in these states, are applying to work in the state or their employer is headquartered in this state

CA

OK

MN
